Patent Information.Patent Title: Antifungal Polypeptide Alyafp From Alyssum And Methods For Controlling Plant Pathogenic Fungi
Patent Information.Abstract: An antifungal polypeptide, AlyAFP, that controls fungal damage to plants is provided. DNA encoding this polypeptide can be cloned into vectors for transformation of plantcolonizing microorganisms or plants, thereby providing a method of inhibiting fungal growth on plants. The polypeptide can be formulated into compositions that can be used to control undesired fungi on plants and elsewhere.
